guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

author.bio_html:

England lives.

body: I choose England, my home. I'm a nationalist, how could I choose anywhere else?

post.title: You die and are told that you will be randomly reincarnated and have only 1 choice to affect your next life; The country you will be born in. What country do you choose and why?

body:
Unironically Japan. They may dislike foreigners, but life seems like it would be pretty sweet over there if I was born an ethnic Japanese person.

Plus, I would be able to be proud of my culture and heritage in the next life without being called a racist white devil.
body_html:
Unironically Japan. They may dislike foreigners, but life seems like it would be pretty sweet over there if I was born an ethnic Japanese person.

Plus, I would be able to be proud of my culture and heritage in the next life without being called a racist white devil.

body: I'd take the risk of being born in California and stick with the USA. All of this Commie bullshit has me appreciating and loving this country more than I ever have.
body_html: I'd take the risk of being born in California and stick with the USA. All of this Commie bullshit has me appreciating and loving this country more than I ever have.

post.title: You die and are told that you will be randomly reincarnated and have only 1 choice to affect your next life; The country you will be born in. What country do you choose and why?

body:
Wow...Im here for the comments, and finding myself rather limited by the question. 

Id be off to Sirius. The brightest star in the nightime sky, in Canis Major. Id be using that bright light to create a more perfect union of beings. Id be joining that. Id be loving that. I would be that. 

So much for death, huh?
body_html:
Wow...Im here for the comments, and finding myself rather limited by the question.

Id be off to Sirius. The brightest star in the nightime sky, in Canis Major. Id be using that bright light to create a more perfect union of beings. Id be joining that. Id be loving that. I would be that.

So much for death, huh?

post.title: You die and are told that you will be randomly reincarnated and have only 1 choice to affect your next life; The country you will be born in. What country do you choose and why?

author.bio: How many time do I have before getting cancelled ?
author.bio_html: How many time do I have before getting cancelled ?

body: Do I keep my memories ? If yes, France, my home country. If no, given the situation of this nation, I will go with Japan. I am more likely to be one of those I hate in France, and work against my own country. In Japan as I'm far enough to be at worst neutral in my actions toward France.
body_html: Do I keep my memories ? If yes, France, my home country. If no, given the situation of this nation, I will go with Japan. I am more likely to be one of those I hate in France, and work against my own country. In Japan as I'm far enough to be at worst neutral in my actions toward France.

post.title: You die and are told that you will be randomly reincarnated and have only 1 choice to affect your next life; The country you will be born in. What country do you choose and why?

body:
Yes, but seeing as Japan stands now mostly because of America, that would mean that America would have fallen by 2050.

Which means that not many places in the world will really be safe, if that's the case.
body_html:
Yes, but seeing as Japan stands now mostly because of America, that would mean that America would have fallen by 2050.

post.title: You die and are told that you will be randomly reincarnated and have only 1 choice to affect your next life; The country you will be born in. What country do you choose and why?

body: Your are welcome. The only limit is your imagination.  Its worth more than any degree, how much money you have (or dont have) or your social status (or lack of status).  No more handcuffs UwmaSenhur. None. They are illusion.

post.title: You die and are told that you will be randomly reincarnated and have only 1 choice to affect your next life; The country you will be born in. What country do you choose and why?

body: Probably Nazi Germany or Switzerland. I really would love to know what life was like in country that was free from the control of International Bankers. Switzerland seems very wealthy despite the fact that third of its population are immigrants. Little corruption, crime is low and its general view on foreign relations is something like "leave me the fuck alone." Japan looks good too but I am not fan of earthquakes or tsunamis.
body_html: Probably Nazi Germany or Switzerland. I really would love to know what life was like in country that was free from the control of International Bankers. Switzerland seems very wealthy despite the fact that third of its population are immigrants. Little corruption, crime is low and its general view on foreign relations is something like "leave me the fuck alone." Japan looks good too but I am not fan of earthquakes or tsunamis.
